Point of Failure: Engineering disasters explored https://github.com/Pointoffailurepod/pointoffailurepod en-gb
PointofFailurePod Engineering disasters explored Co
An impartial deep dive into the events, effects and causes of accidents. Looking to identify the points of failure in the chain of events that lead to a tragic end.

Episode 1: Fire and explosion aboard the chemical tanker Stolt Groenland Episode 1: Fire and explosion aboard the chemical tanker Stolt Groenland Co
A look into the fire and explosion aboard the chemical tanker Stolt Groenland, resulting from a runaway chemical reaction.
